meanings.definition: To create a sequel to a previously released work.
meanings.sent1: The director is sequelizing the popular movie for the fans.
meanings.sent2: She enjoys sequelizing stories to continue the adventures of her favorite characters.
meanings.sent3: The author couldn't resist sequelizing the magical world she had created.
meanings.sent4: His mind was sequelizing the possibilities of what could happen next.
meanings.sent5: The artist was sequelizing the canvas with vibrant colors and new characters.

meanings.definition: The act of producing a sequel to a film or book.
meanings.sent1: Sequelizing can sometimes lead to new and exciting storylines.
meanings.sent2: The sequelizing of the novel was eagerly anticipated by readers.
meanings.sent3: The studio's sequelizing of the movie franchise brought joy to many fans.
meanings.sent4: Her passion for sequelizing inspired others to continue beloved tales.
meanings.sent5: The art of sequelizing requires creativity and respect for the original work.
